articles.description: Neeraj Chopra has been training hard to hit the ground in June with his sights firmly on breaching the 90m mark
articles.content:
Neeraj Chopra is leaner, meaner and ready for action as the Tokyo Olympic gold medallist sweated it out in readiness for the upcoming grind.
